about_the_game:
Explore a world of decaying mechanical islands as Amber and her creature companion, Monty. Your home is a last surviving village in a world covered in soot and smoke, barely touched by sunlight - but even this haven will not last forever.
Set out on a quest to solve a mystery surrounding recent deaths and uncover secrets and lore hidden under the soot.

Key features:

  • Dive into an episodic adventure in the world of postapocalyptic steampunk.
    Experience a human story about survivors, fear and kindness.
  • Explore with Monty, your animal companion - some problems will require you to see the world through his eyes.
  • Climb your way past decaying architecture to discover hidden secrets, lore, puzzles and collectibles.
  • Meet the cast of villagers with unique personalities and aid their struggles.

name: Devorian: Left Behind
short_description: Episodic adventure set in a post apocalyptic steampunk world. Explore shattered mechanical islands as Amber, a young engineer, with Monty, her animal companion - struggling to survive in the harsh air filled with soot and smoke, while their village is the only place where life lives on. For now.
